text: I pretty much go on and on and on and on

it's really fun it's a great way to use

you have like an extra stock laying

trim the ends of the rhubarb the leaves
are poisonous you certainly don't want
them plus they don't taste like anything
so don't eat those and then slice it
lengthwise just cuz this is kind of a
thick stalk you don't have to do it if
it's less thick you need a half a pound
a rhubarb cut into half-inch pieces add
your rhubarb to a tablespoon of light

but you add sweet to it and it gives an
amazing tangy sweet balance that is
unmatched really and then add a quarter
cup of flour the flours there to thicken
the juices in the rhubarb because it's
actually really watery so you want to
make sure that you have something there
to absorb it so it doesn't go into the
cake while it's baking now you want to
make a swizzle or a crumb topping in
this bowl I have a half a cup of brown
sugar
to that add a cup of flour
and then six tablespoons of melted
unsalted butter and just stir it
together with a fork until it starts to
form clumps and everything is combined
and that's exactly what you're looking
for because this is your streusel

protect yourself

you start off too high you're gonna be

then beat to combine after each addition
and then add your second egg
and then the vanilla extract half a
teaspoon of vanilla don't measure it
over the bowl because you never know
when you're going to spill the entire
bottle in there and then ruin the entire
thing okay I mean you can do it at your
own risk and then add your flour make

to similarly to the confectioner sugar
you want to make sure you don't let the

then you're going to want to put it into
an 8x8 baking dish that's been buttered

spread the batter evenly into the pan
spatula works great for that and then
sprinkle the rhubarb mixture evenly over

but it's up to you can do it however you
want
bake in a 350 degree oven until a

come out of the oven you want to make
sure that you let them cool completely

might need to run your knife around the

completely released from the sides and
then you should be able to lift it out
